name: Sweety
description:
Hi everyone :)

Sweety is a 2D game made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2019. The theme was "Only one".

It was a real challenge because I realized all the different parts of the game : art, design, code, musics and sounds.

Each level has a different atmosphere, whether through these visuals or its music. I wanted to introduce a new game mechanics per stage.

I hope you'll enjoy it ^_^

---

You can press escape to restart a level if you're stuck or change the volume of the music.

---

Software / tools used

  • Musics : https://www.beepbox.co/
  • Sounds : rFXGen
  • Pixel art : PhotoFiltre Studio X
